description: Written with activity directors, camp counselors, coaches and teachers in mind. Plus parents, who take on all those roles. It includes camp-tested games for boys and girls ages 4 to 16, with easy-to-follow instructions and illustrations. There are indoor and outdoor games for large and small groups, all of which require little or no special equipment. And advice on choosing the right game for the situation, starting and ending games, dealing with rule breakers and modifying games for varied abilities.
name: The 175 Best Camp Games

specs.value: Kathleen Fraser, Laura Fraser, Mary Fraser
